t: Amazon
s: Amazon does not supply branded boxes. Those are used for products shipped FBA (Fulfillment By Amazon) from the Amazon FC's. DO NOT reuse old used boxes or branded boxes from any other retailer. Depending on your product size USPS does make Priority Mail boxes and other mailers available for free. These are OK to use, as USPS does not sell products and a USPS box is not going to confuse buyers ...
